sub correct_ans {

# Number of lines of code in new: 22
sub new {
    my $type = shift;
    my ($rnd,$pq,$pa,@params) = @_;
    my $self = ChoiceList->new($rnd,$pq,$pa);
    $self = bless $self, $type;
    my ($var,$val);
    @params = (
        valign => "MIDDLE",
    align => "RIGHT",
        numbered => 0,
        equals => 1,
        ans_rule_len => 10,
        spacing => 5,
        tex_spacing => "0pt",
        @params
    );
    while (@params) {
    $var = shift(@params); $val = shift(@params);
    $self->{$var} = $val;
    }
    return $self;
}
public method AlignedList::qa (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in qa: 10
sub qa {
    my $self = shift;
    $self->SUPER::qa(@_);
    my $n = scalar(@{$self->{questions}});
    $self->{selected_q} = [@{$self->{questions}}];
    $self->{selected_a} = [@{$self->{answers}}];
    $self->{slice} = [0..$n];
    $self->{shuffle} = [0..$n];
    $self->{inverted_shuffle} = [0..$n];
}
public method AlignedList::selectQA (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:

# Number of lines of code in selectQA: 7
sub selectQA {
    my $self = shift;
    $self->{selected_q} = [@{$self->{questions}}[@{$self->{slice}}]];
    $self->{selected_a} = [@{$self->{answers}}[@{$self->{slice}}]];
    $self->{shuffle} = [0..scalar(@{$self->{slice}})];
    $self->{inverted_shuffle} = [0..scalar(@{$self->{slice}})];
}
